import React,{useState} from "react"; import './user-profile.css' import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardFooter, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; function UserProfile({user, setShowChangePassword}){ const[name,setName] = useState(""); const[gender,setGender] = useState(false); const[date,setDate] = useState(""); const submitSave = () =>{ console.log(name); console.log(gender); console.log(date); } const getGender = () =>{ if(user.Gender === 1){ return document.getElementById('gender_Male').classList.checked; }else{ return document.getElementById('gender_Female').classList.checked; } } return(user)?
